"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5552bb9863687243b6d71500#post_5552bb9863687243b6d71500

Take everything that's cliche and dated about the original (Which is about 80-90% total), then add stuff that's cliche and uninspired nowadays, couple with concepts that are never fully explored, or never brought up again. And that's what you get.
